mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_ANALYSIS ( JOY, SADNESS, DISGUST, CONTEMPT, ANGER, FEAR, SURPRISE, VALENCE, ENGAGEMENT, TIMESTAMP, FILENAME, SMILE, INNERBROWRAISE, BROWRAISE, BROWFURROW, NOSEWRINKLE, UPPERLIPRAISE, LIPCORNERDEPRESSOR, CHINRAISE, LIPPUCKER, LIPPRESS, LIPSUCK, MOUTHOPEN, SMIRK, EYECLOSURE, ATTENTION, LIDTIGHTEN, JAWDROP, DIMPLER, EYEWIDEN, CHEEKRAISE, LIPSTRETCH, REG_DT ) VALUES ( #{joy}, #{sadness}, #{disgust}, #{contempt}, #{anger}, #{fear}, #{surprise}, #{valence}, #{engagement}, #{Timestamp}, #{FileName}, #{smile}, #{innerBrowRaise}, #{browRaise}, #{browFurrow}, #{noseWrinkle}, #{upperLipRaise}, #{lipCornerDepressor}, #{chinRaise}, #{lipPucker}, #{lipPress}, #{lipSuck}, #{mouthOpen}, #{smirk}, #{eyeClosure}, #{attention}, #{lidTighten}, #{jawDrop}, #{dimpler}, #{eyeWiden}, #{cheekRaise}, #{lipStretch}, NOW() )
